Lu Ling

My research interests focus on social science, including causal discovery, quantitative modeling, and deep learning for large-scale variables from time-series data, and provide solutions oriented to facilitate efficient, effective, and interpretable generalizations in decision-support systems.

Email  /  Google Scholar  /  LinkedIn  /  CV
